name: Sarah Chen
bio: Former McKinsey consultant who specialized in healthcare before pivoting to tech PM at Amazon. Led digital transformation projects and now works on Alexa features. Great resource for consulting-to-tech transitions.

name: Michael Rodriguez
bio: Investment banking analyst at Goldman for 3 years before moving to JPM's corporate strategy group. Now in Deloitte's M&A practice. Can speak to finance and consulting career paths.

name: Priya Patel
bio: Built fraud detection models at Capital One before joining Google's Cloud AI team. Strong background in financial services analytics and ML applications.

name: James Thompson
bio: Former Naval officer with 5 years experience. Transitioned to defense consulting at Booz Allen before joining Bain. Specializes in operations and supply chain.

name: Emily Wang
bio: Spent 4 years at Accenture in technology consulting before moving to IBM's Watson team. Now at Microsoft working on Azure products. Great for consulting and cloud/enterprise tech questions.

name: David Kim
bio: Investment banking analyst at Morgan Stanley covering tech sector. Brief stint at a SaaS startup before business school. Now in PE focusing on software investments.

name: Rachel Johnson
bio: Taught high school math through TFA, then joined an EdTech startup as employee #8. Pivoting to consulting with interest in education and social impact.

name: Alex Martinez
bio: Early employee at DoorDash working on logistics and ops. Moved to Amazon for scale experience, now at Stripe building payments infrastructure. Great for marketplace and fintech ops.

name: Jessica Brown
bio: Air Force officer turned Lockheed engineer. Transitioning to tech consulting with cybersecurity focus. Can speak to military-to-civilian career paths.

name: Ryan O'Connor
bio: Spent 5 years in enterprise software sales and implementation. Strong technical background with CRM and ERP systems. Now doing pre-sales engineering at Salesforce.

name: Aisha Williams
bio: Development economist with 4 years at multilateral institutions. Pivoting to strategy consulting with focus on emerging markets and social impact.

name: Kevin Zhang
bio: Worked on TikTok's algorithm team in Beijing before relocating to US. Now at Meta working on Instagram Reels. Unique perspective on international tech markets.

name: Lauren Davis
bio: Private equity analyst at Blackstone covering industrials. Brief stint at Carlyle before MBA. Focused on buyout investments and operational value creation.

name: Carlos Gutierrez
bio: Operations lead at Bird managing city launches and regulatory relationships. Moved to Uber to scale up mobility operations. Expert in gig economy and micromobility.

name: Sophia Lee
bio: Revenue management analyst at Delta for 3 years. Deep expertise in airline economics and operations. Now consulting for transportation clients.

name: Marcus Johnson
bio: Hardware engineer at Intel before moving to AMD's product team. Now at Nvidia marketing GPUs for AI applications. Strong technical background in chip design.

name: Nina Gupta
bio: Quantitative researcher at Two Sigma building algorithmic trading strategies. Physics PhD background. Now at Bridgewater doing macro research.

name: Tom Anderson
bio: Launched Amazon's third-party seller tools before moving to Walmart's eCommerce division. Now helping Shopify merchants scale. Deep eCommerce and marketplace expertise.

name: Maya Robinson
bio: Peace Corps volunteer in East Africa for 2 years, then worked at education nonprofit. Bringing operational experience to McKinsey's social sector practice.

name: Chris Park
bio: Cloud engineer at AWS working on data services. Moved to MongoDB for database expertise, now doing solutions architecture at Snowflake. Deep data platform knowledge.
